endpoints.description: The Enrichment API lets you look up person and company data based on an email. For example, you could retrieve a person’s name, location and social handles from an email
endpoints.name: Enrichment API Email

endpoints.description: The Enrichment API lets you look up person and company data based on a domain. For example,  you could lookup a company’s location, headcount or logo based on their domain name.
endpoints.name: Enrichment API Domain

endpoints.description: A common use-case is looking up a person and company simultaneously based on a email address. To save you making two requests to do this, we offer a combined lookup API. This endpoint expects an email address, and will return an object containing both the person and company (if found)
endpoints.name: Combined API

info.description: Check for names, addresses, domains and more based on lookups of e-mail addresses on clearbit.com
info.name: Clearbit
